channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dog waste bin needs emptying, 4th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86-87, St Aidan's Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flower planter rotted through, 4th August
item.description:
Good evening, I understand one of my neighbors had raised this earlier in the year that this long planter box had rotted through and need to be replaced and the Council had indicated it would be fixed. Can this be looked into as it has been like this since the beginning of the year and continues to get worse. The front of this long box has completely rotted away. It would be great to use some recycled composite wood or something that will last longer to fix the front of this long planter that everyone looks after. Thank you in advance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken dumped lime bike, 4th August
item.description:

item.title: Road is constantly full of litter, 4th August
item.description:
Most mornings the businesses on the road come to see the site of the road like this. Unfortunately there are many rough sleepers who drink on the road, as well as students and others using the road as a hang out. There needs to be more bins too

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Corsham Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
